alert.note: Alert for Will (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 26 at 5:01PM CDT until March 26 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM CDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL WILL COUNTY... At 500 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Wilton Center, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Public. At 451 PM, quarter size hail was reported in Symerton. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Peotone, Manhattan and Wilton Center. This includes... Will County Fairgrounds. Including the following interstate... I-57 between mile markers 325 and 329. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
